text:
At this point, we all knew it was a GPT wrapper, but I think Cluey's USP wasn't getting detected by meeting platforms.

Is that really easy as well ? https://t.co/VOCZ50ZTdi

Guess who Had a tech interview Today

🚀 Me: *[Exists]*  
💼 HR: "Build something with RAG, reapply in 30 days."
🔮 Verdict: *Rejected (but weirdly motivated?)*

Also, posting this pic coz I look good in it. Fight me.

#TechTwitter #RAG 
1st interview—don’t make a habit of it https://t.co/GsDZY2Wfkc

Built a Personal Portfolio in just 1 day😤
🖌️ Frontend: Vibe Code (plus a dash of debugging magic)
🔧 Backend: Flask
🧠 LLM: Gemini 1.5 Flash
Almost deployable—just needs a bit more ✨
My full-stack peers are on the verge of filing emotional bug reports 💀
#AI #LLM #Flask #WebDev https://t.co/wNCSMBuzq9

I am an AI Guy, and I want full control over the UI of my AI apps
So I started learning full-stack. It was a mistake,
so I made some changes to the plans.
and...

I was able to build this site, https://t.co/juOH8juT2s, in just a day, and deployed it as well

Tools used in building this Deepsite, Flask, Gemini 1.5 Flash, render for deployment, and a whole lot of APIs, and voilà🥐a fully working FullStack Web APP
I can use the same Strategies for building my Future AI Projects and have Full Control over the UI of the apps
#development
